attributes.action: communities against the closure of local police stations
attributes.additional_details:
To stop the closure of local police stations in and around Wales, these buildings should be left open to the public to visit !!
At present the plan is to close Milford Haven police station and these officers actually police near to 30,000 residents.

rejection.details: This is an operational matter for the police and as such, it would not be appropriate for the Wales Office to intervene.
